title: Pilgrim of the Storm
description: The Stormblade Temple has protected mankind for eons. A bastion against a vengeful god, it stands as the sole defense against the enslavement of humanity.  That was long ago. Now, the gods are silent. And humanity has found their own slaves.  Sidge has never known his own people, an insectoid race doomed to the slavery which humanity escaped. Adopted by an eccentric monk, Sidge was spared the same fate and accepted into the illustrious ranks of the Stormblade Temple.  But dark omens mean that his quiet life as an acolyte is about to end.  The Temple’s patron, a mighty storm dragon, grows restless. It seeks a new vessel for its Wisdom, a new leader for the temple. Yet despite his devotion, Sidge has never been granted even a spark of that Wisdom.  Meanwhile, the most likely successor sees Sidge’s presence as an affront to the gods. With few allies, Sidge and his mentor begin a desperate attempt to compete for leadership of the temple he loves. Fail and he'll be cast out to join his brethren in chains.  His first journey outside the temple walls will not only test Sidge’s faith but his sense of identity as he races to ensure his beloved temple does not fall into the wrong hands. But it isn't only his temple's patron who grows restless. The elder gods have begun to stir…
author: Russ Linton
